doors.title: The Gift of Friendship
doors.poem:
Through all the years and changing days,
A friend stands true in countless ways.
In laughter shared and tears wiped dry,
A bond that time cannot deny.
doors.caption: A cherished moment

doors.title: Love's Warm Embrace
doors.poem:
Love finds us in the quiet hours,
In gentle words and simple powers.
A glance, a touch, a whispered name,
Two hearts that beat as one, the same.
doors.caption: Together always

doors.title: Moments Together
doors.poem:
The hours we spend, just you and I,
Beneath the ever-changing sky.
Each moment precious, held so dear,
The sweetest times throughout the year.
doors.caption: Quality time

doors.title: Holiday Magic
doors.poem:
When winter's chill wraps round the earth,
We gather close around the hearth.
With twinkling lights and carols sung,
The magic of when we were young.
doors.caption: Holiday celebrations

doors.title: A Heart of Gratitude
doors.poem:
For every blessing, large and small,
For those who catch us when we fall.
With thankful heart, I count each one,
The gifts of life beneath the sun.
doors.caption: Counting blessings

doors.title: Family Bonds
doors.poem:
The roots run deep, the branches wide,
In family's love, we all abide.
Through generations, stories told,
A treasure worth more than gold.
doors.caption: Family gathering

doors.title: Life's Winding Path
doors.poem:
The road we walk has twists and turns,
With lessons that each traveler learns.
Through valleys low and mountains high,
We journey on beneath the sky.
doors.caption: On the road

doors.title: What Matters Most
doors.poem:
In quiet moments, truth appears,
Beyond the rush of days and years.
The meaning found in simple things,
The joy that love and presence brings.
doors.caption: Reflection

doors.title: Joy and Laughter
doors.poem:
Let laughter ring through every room,
Dispelling shadows, lifting gloom.
In silly jokes and playful jest,
We find that joy is life's true test.
doors.caption: Laughing together

doors.title: Adventures Shared
doors.poem:
To distant shores and places new,
Adventure calls to me and you.
With courage bold and spirits free,
We chase the horizon, wild and free.
doors.caption: Exploring together

doors.title: Always There
doors.poem:
When storms arise and skies turn grey,
You stand beside me, come what may.
A steady hand, a listening ear,
Your support dissolves each fear.
doors.caption: Through thick and thin

doors.title: Hope for Tomorrow
doors.poem:
As this chapter gently ends,
New beginnings round the bend.
With hope alight in heart and soul,
The future beckons, bright and whole.
doors.caption: Looking forward
